detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-animation-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-animation-name';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-aspect-ratio-more';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-hoverable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-image';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-avatar-svg';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-breadcrumb-custom-expander';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-breadcrumb-customized';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-breadcrumb-limitation';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-card-border-color';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-card-elevation';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-card-tile';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-counter-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-indicator';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Cropper, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const CropperShape = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid gutter="md">      
      <Grid.Item xs="6">        
        <Cropper shape="rectangle" aspectRatio="2" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="6">        
        <Grid gutter="md">          
          <Grid.Item xs="12">            
            <Cropper shape="square" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>            
          </Grid.Item>          
          <Grid.Item xs="12">            
            <Cropper shape="circle" src="/assets/images/panda.jpg"></Cropper>            
          </Grid.Item>          
        </Grid>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default CropperShape;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-shape';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Cropper, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react"; const CropperStyles = () => { return

import { Cropper, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const CropperStyles = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid gutter="md">      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="5">        
        <Cropper className="style-1" indicator mode="crop" shape="circle" resizer="main" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/penguin.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="7">        
        <Cropper className="style-2" indicator mode="crop" resizer="both" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/penguin.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="6">        
        <Cropper className="style-3" guides indicator mode="crop" resizer="main" resizerShape="circle" shape="circle" src="/assets/images/cat.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="6">        
        <Cropper className="style-4" guides mode="crop" resizer="edge" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/cat.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="7">        
        <Cropper className="style-5" backdrop background mode="crop" resizer="edge" resizerShape="line" src="/assets/images/ladybug.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="12" sm="5">        
        <Cropper className="style-6" src="/assets/images/bear.jpg"></Cropper>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default CropperStyles;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-cropper-styles';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-animation';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-full-width';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-nesting';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-persistent';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<plus-grid justify-content="center" gutter="md">
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
    <button id="element1">Small dialog</button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
    <button id="element2">Large dialog</button>
  </plus-grid-item>
  <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
    <button id="element3">Extra large dialog</button>
  </plus-grid-item>
</plus-grid>
<plus-dialog id="element4" animation="fade">
  <plus-dialog-content>
    <plus-dialog-header> Dialog Title </plus-dialog-header>
    <plus-dialog-body>
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod
      tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim
      veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea
      commodo consequat.
    </plus-dialog-body>
    <plus-dialog-footer>
      <button id="element5">Close</button>
    </plus-dialog-footer>
  </plus-dialog-content>
</plus-dialog>

<plus-grid justify-content="center" gutter="md">
          <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
            <button @click="show('sm')">Small dialog</button>
          </plus-grid-item>
          <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
            <button @click="show('lg')">Large dialog</button>
          </plus-grid-item>
          <plus-grid-item xs="12" sm="auto">
            <button @click="show('xl')">Extra large dialog</button>
          </plus-grid-item>
        </plus-grid>
<plus-dialog animation="fade" :open="open" :size="size" @plusClose="hide()">
          <plus-dialog-content>
            <plus-dialog-header>Dialog Title</plus-dialog-header>
            <plus-dialog-body>
              Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do
              eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut
              enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris
              nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
            </plus-dialog-body>
            <plus-dialog-footer>
              <button @click="hide()">Close</button>
            </plus-dialog-footer>
          </plus-dialog-content>
        </plus-dialog>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-size';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-dialog-specific-scrollable';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-customize';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-placement';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-divider-vertical';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react"; const DrawerDefault = () => { return
Drawer Content Toggle
; }; export default DrawerDefault;

import { Card, Drawer, Grid } from "@htmlplus/react";

const DrawerDefault = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid>      
      <Grid.Item xs="auto">        
        <Drawer animation="fade" size="200px" connector="drawer-default">          
          <Card>
            Drawer Content
          </Card>          
        </Drawer>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item xs="grow">        
        <Card>          
          <Drawer.Toggler connector="drawer-default">
            Toggle
          </Drawer.Toggler>          
        </Card>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default DrawerDefault;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-align-content';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-align-self';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-gutter-x';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-justify-content';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-order';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-grid-vertical';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-icon-color';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-icon-rotate';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

enters or exits the viewport. (Its a component for detecting when elements are visible within the user's viewport).

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-intersection-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-portal-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-portal-strategy';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-scroll-indicator-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react";

const SpinnerColor = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-1"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-2"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-3"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-4"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner className="spinner-5"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default SpinnerColor;

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react"; const SpinnerType = () => { return
; }; export default SpinnerType;

import { Grid, Spinner } from "@htmlplus/react";

const SpinnerType = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="default"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="double-bounce"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="ripple"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="dual-ring"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <Spinner type="square"></Spinner>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default SpinnerType;

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-spinner-type';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'vue-sticky-state-attribute';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-sticky-top';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-switch-reverse';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-grow';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-reverse';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

detail.javascript:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <title>Downloading...</title>
    <meta charset="utf-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
  </head>
  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tabs-separate';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'javascript-tooltip-arrows';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();

    </script>
  </body>
</html>

  <body onload="load()">
    <script>
      async function load() {   
        const response = await fetch(`data:application/zip;base64,`);

        const blob = await response.blob();

        const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);

        const anchor = document.createElement('a');

        anchor.href = url;

        anchor.download = 'react-dedicated-tooltip-default';

        document.body.appendChild(anchor);

        anchor.click();

        document.body.removeChild(anchor);

        URL.revokeObjectURL(url);

        window.close();
      }
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

import { Grid, Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react"; const TooltipTrigger = () => { return
; }; export default TooltipTrigger;

import { Grid, Tooltip } from "@htmlplus/react";

const TooltipTrigger = () => {
  return <>    
    <Grid justifyContent="evenly">      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Hover
          <Tooltip trigger="hover">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Focus
          <Tooltip trigger="focus">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
      <Grid.Item>        
        <button>
          Click
          <Tooltip trigger="click">
            Tooltip
          </Tooltip>          
        </button>        
      </Grid.Item>      
    </Grid>    
  </>;
};

export default TooltipTrigger;
